title: 417: Breaking Up Over Skype + Liking Ex’s Insta Pics w/ Craig and Sadie!
itunes:title: 417: Breaking Up Over Skype + Liking Ex’s Insta Pics w/ Craig and Sadie!
description:
The Broads are joined by one of their favorite couples, stand up comedian Craig Conant and witch/coach Sadie Olson! Enjoy the chaos as these four laugh their way through catching up, chatting ghosts, their open relationship, and then answering the #broadsquad’s breakup, hookup, and relationship questions! 

CRAIG CONANT:

See Craig on tour: https://www.craigconant.com/#tour 

Listen to his podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/community-service-with-craig-conant/id1441475405 

Buy his merch: https://craigconantstore.com/ 

Follow him on instagram: https://www.instagram.com/craigpconant/ 

SADIE OLSON:

Check out Sadie’s coaching and classes: https://iamsadieolson.com/magick/

Follow her on instagram: https://www.instagram.com/IAMSADIEOLSON/ 

Listen to her podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/goddess-hangs/id1544695240 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***FIELD OF GREENS: Get 15% off your first order and another 10% off when you subscribe for recurring orders at FIELDOFGREENS.COM and use promo code CHATTY

***FIRST PERSON: Get 15% off your first order by going to GETFIRSTPERSON.COM and use code CHATTY 

***HELLO FRESH: Go to HELLOFRESH.COM/CHATTY16 and use code CHATTY16 for up to 16 free meals and 3 free gifts! 

***NATIVE: Go to NATIVEDEO.COM/CHATTY or use promo code CHATTY at checkout to get 20% off your first order!

***JENNI KAYNE: Get 20% off all furniture and home decor, plus early product access and much more with a JKH Membership at JENNIKAYNE.COM/HOME 

***THRIVE MARKET: Get $80 in free groceries at THRIVEMARKET.COM/CHATTY 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
